General.Name: Tifico Fiber Indonesia Tbk
General.Description: PT Tifico Fiber Indonesia Tbk manufactures and sells polyester products in Indonesia. The company offers polyester chips, staple fibers, and filament yarns, as well as RCL products. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Tangerang, Indonesia.
